data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Golovatch, Sergei I., Geoffroy, Jean-Jacques, Stoev, Pavel, Spiegel, Didier Vanden (2013): Review of the millipede family Opisotretidae (Diplopoda, Polydesmida), with descriptions of new species. ZooKeys 302: 13-77, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.302.5357, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.302.5357
